text: And the sequence in the text is different than in the first part of the Shmah, we have between your eyes. First to bind them to have the vision and then ye shall teach them to your children. And as we have gone through the mill, we need not teach them to the children any more diligently and the children will grasp now what will befall them without visionary power.
handwritten_text: And the sequence in the text is different than in the first part of the Shmah, we have between your eyes. First to bind them to have the vision and then ye shall teach them to your children. And as we have gone through the mill, we need not teach them to the children any more diligently and the children will grasp now what will befall them without visionary power.
